references.reason: This paper is foundational to object detection and instance segmentation, which are major tasks in this paper.

references.paper_title: Feature Pyramid Networks for Object Detection
references.reason: This work introduced feature pyramids, a crucial component used in many modern object detection systems, including those discussed in this paper.

references.paper_title: An image is worth 16x16 words: Transformers for image recognition at scale
references.reason: This paper introduced the vision transformer (ViT), a key architecture that this paper builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: Training data-efficient image transformers & distillation through attention
references.reason: This paper details training techniques for vision transformers, which are relevant to the training and optimization strategies in this paper.

references.paper_title: Vision Transformer Adapter for Dense Predictions
references.reason: This paper directly addresses adapting vision transformers for dense prediction tasks, providing a strong baseline and related work for comparison.
